entry.title: Sunday: Showers or drizzle. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle early this morning. A few showers beginning this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 23 April 2023
